name: medicinal-product-mapper
description: XML-based medicinal product mapper with SNOMED CT and ATC code lookup

tools.name: map_medications_from_xml
tools.description: Map substance names to SNOMED CT Concept IDs and ATC codes from XML input (resource-intensive, use map_single_medication for single substances)

xml_content.description: XML content containing medication data with substance names

max_medications.description: Maximum number of medications to process (default: 10, max: 50)

tools.name: map_single_medication
tools.description: Map a single substance to SNOMED CT Concept ID and ATC codes (lightweight, recommended for single substances)

substance_name.description: Name of the substance to map

tools.name: get_atc_codes
tools.description: Get ATC codes for a specific substance from Felleskatalogen

substance_name.description: Name of the substance to look up ATC codes for

tools.name: get_snomed_concept_id
tools.description: Get SNOMED CT Concept ID for a specific substance

substance_name.description: Name of the substance to look up SNOMED CT Concept ID for
